title: Secret scan must pass before ship
External-content ingestion must be treated as untrusted
Any red release gate blocks publish
No run without declared budget envelope
Cap exceedance must force blocked state
Safety-critical decisions require explicit authority owner
Role conflict beyond SLA auto-blocks safety decisions
Externally-facing claims require evidence or explicit caveat
Gate and exception logs are append-only
Architecture-impacting changes require ADR before merge
Kill-switch safe mode blocks external publish
Unsupported claims cannot be marked safe-to-say
Run artifacts must retain reconstructable lineage
